reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-built with a beautiful pattern that looks exactly as pictured, and appreciate its thick soft material that isn't scratchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and soft!
items.body: Love this sweater! It’s so soft and very good quality. Not flimsy and fits well. The pattern and coloring is exactly as pictured. I received a lot of compliments wearing it, but most importantly was incredible comfortable in it! Read more
items.author: mac99

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great buy, nice and warm
items.body: This sweater is beautiful and soft, not itchy! It’s heavier weight for warmth on cold days and nights. The design is beautiful as well with a slight German heritage flair. It has washed very well too, with no shrinking and holds its shape. Read more
items.author: Denise Bergman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful quality sweater with fabulous price point
items.body: I love this sweater! The compliments I get all day at work and out are a great confidence booster. The material is so soft against the skin and the weight of this piece is wonderful. It feels expensive and the quality easily measures up to any of the more expensive brands. I ordered a Medium and it fits perfectly. The style is a little preppy, very on trend and so lounge worthy! It had some wrinkles in it when it first arrived as it was very well packaged with a vacuum seal. I will be buying another soon, ! Read more
items.author: Nancyd1970

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Sweater Ever
items.body: Soft and not itchy. Great quality. Fits well and comfortable. It's a sweater but it's light. Beautiful detail on the sweater and pattern. Love! Read more
items.author: Lauren

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality
items.body: Attractive sweater, well made, nice winter weight. Read more
items.author: opal

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater, soft material
items.body: Love!!! So soft, fit is great. I like that it fits a little looser and away from the body than some of my other sweaters. Almost feels like a sweatshirt more than a sweater - super comfortable and stylish! Read more
items.author: Cindy Hackmann

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just buy it. It's the best sweater
items.body: I will start by saying this is my favorite sweater. I have gotten a lot of shirts and sweaters off of the internet, and I was pleasantly surprised at the Quality of this sweater. It's really nice. And the colors are true the picture. I want to say I've worn this about a dozen times so far. I get compliments on it every single time I wear it. I also just throw it in the wash with my other shirts on cold, and dry on regular heat, it has not shown any sign of shrinking. I have long arms so the first time I washed it I was a little worried it might shrink up, but it washes great. Because of the weight of the sweater it's kind of naturally wrinkle resistant as well. It's cozy it's warm, it's soft. I love this sweater. When I bought it it was on sale for $30 and that was a bargain. If you are thinking about buying this sweater, just buy it. I'm on here about to buy it in every other color and pattern. Read more
items.author: KeenJane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute sweater!
items.body: Love this! It's a nice sturdy material, but isn't rough. It's a nice fit and super cute! Read more
items.author: K. Lavonte

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Navy, Khaki, Pink, White, Apricot, Black, Dusty Green, Caramel, Dusty Blue, Fire Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
